name: common-development
description: Essential development tools used across all programming languages

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y curl
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y curl

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y wget
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y wget

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y gh
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y gh

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y vim
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y vim

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y nano
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y nano

commands.install: sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y openjdk-17-jdk
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y openjdk-17-jdk

commands.install: curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh && sudo sh get-docker.sh
commands.remove: sudo apt remove -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y docker-ce

chrome-remote-desktop.name: chrome-remote-desktop
chrome-remote-desktop.description: Remote desktop access via Chrome browser

commands.install: wget -qO - https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | sudo apt-key add - && echo 'deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y google-chrome-stable
commands.remove: sudo apt remove -y google-chrome-stable && sudo rm -f /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google-chrome.list
commands.update: sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y google-chrome-stable
